author: Jeff Greenfield
title: No, Politics Won’t Take a Break for the Virus
description: Even in war, Americans keep arguing—and that’s how the country is supposed to work.
content:
Trump, for his part, reportedly wants to establish himself in the crisis as a wartime president, above the fray, but cant resist stopping to tweak his own rivals, from Joe Biden to Mitt Romney.
Is this the way the U.S. government is supposed to behave in the… [+9301 chars]
